skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto info
des:
This skill can be used to keep you connected with current Cryptocurrency price trends, without the need to use a web browser. 

You can get the details of hundreds of different cryptocurrencies, including the price in four main currencies (USD, GBP, EUR and JPY) and how much the price has changed in the last 24 hours.

You can also create a virtual portfolio, where you can add coins, update coins and delete coins to help you keep track of the currencies you own. Use phrases like 'What's in my portfolio' to see what you're currently holding. You can also retrieve the value of your portfolio in GBP, EUR, USD or JPY by saying 'How much is my portfolio worth'.

Another great feature to make use of is the prediction feature, which uses the Low, High, Open, Close and Volume values from yesterday to predict the price that Bitcoin will close at tomorrow. You can use this to see whether buying some Bitcoin would be a good idea today

Although the prediction is quite accurate, there is no guarantee that it will close at that value and so use it to invest AT YOUR OWN RISK
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
